Summary Hello and thanks for visiting my Linked In site. 
 
Johnson’s Life Journey Creed (at work version) 
 
I believe in the goodness of the God of Heaven, family, country, and fellow mankind; I deeply value my fellow workers and my friends. This goodness is strengthened by character, faith, experience, humor, and love. We ‘live’ when we experience life to its fullest and enjoy this gift we have.  
 
The future is brighter than today, new horizons elevate every aspiration. The best is expected of ourselves, reaching for the highest achievement, the best finish.  
 
To excel as a team in the world resembles the workings of a well-oiled Formula 1 gearbox. The input is multiplied by the essential parts for higher output – sometimes more torque, sometimes more speed. Everyone is an essential part of the team. The best is expected of ourselves, reaching for the highest achievement, the best finish.  
 
We are on an adventure and a journey, and this necessitates leadership. Leadership is an honor and privilege, never given. Expect the best, fix the mundane, and when moments happen, we must all respond by being honorable leaders. The finest leaders are learners of all things, curious, inquisitive, sage listeners, taking sagacious actions. 
 
We learn continually, especially during challenging times, it refines the soul. And, refinement of the soul is the ultimate achievement.
